title: Verify your email
subtitle: We've sent a verification link to

instructions.title: Check your inbox
instructions.description: Click the verification link in the email to activate your account. The link will expire in 24 hours.

tips.title: Email not showing up?
tips.checkSpam: Check your spam or junk folder
tips.checkEmail: Make sure you entered the correct email address
tips.wait: Wait a few minutes for the email to arrive
tips.addContact: Add contact@baytup.fr to your email contacts

benefits.title: Why verify your email?
benefits.security: Secure your account and enable password recovery
benefits.notifications: Receive important booking and hosting notifications
benefits.updates: Get updates on new features and special offers
benefits.trust: Build trust with other users on the platform
